description: Returns a paginated list of self-service actions associated with the specified Product ID and Provisioning Artifact ID.

parameters.name: ProductId
parameters.description: The product identifier. For example, prod-abcdzk7xy33qa.

parameters.name: ProvisioningArtifactId
parameters.description: The identifier of the provisioning artifact. For example, pa-4abcdjnxjj6ne.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

nested_items.name: ServiceActionSummaries
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the self-service actions associated with the provisioning artifact.

nested_items.name: DefinitionType
nested_items.description: The self-service action definition type. For example, SSM_AUTOMATION.

nested_items.name: NextPageToken
nested_items.description: The page token to use to retrieve the next set of results. If there are no additional results, this value is null.
